title: Here Are a Bunch of Movies That Have Fewer Oscars Than Suicide Squad

organizations.name: academy award winning film suicide squad

text:
Here Are a Bunch of Movies That Have Fewer Oscars Than Suicide Squad 
Take that, Dr. Strangelove . By Jaya Saxena Feb 26, 2017 The world's most tWiSteD film Suicide Squad just won an Oscar for Best Makeup, beating out Star Trek Beyond and A Man Called Ove . Which now means we have to call it "Academy Award Winning Film Suicide Squad ," so take a moment to roll that around your mouth. While you sit with that reality, here's a list of films that have fewer Oscars than Academy Award Winning Film Suicide Squad . Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Bomb The Color Purple
